description: [APT29](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0016) has stolen Chrome browser cookies by copying the Chrome profile directories of targeted users.(Citation: CrowdStrike StellarParticle January 2022)

external_references.description: CrowdStrike. (2022, January 27). Early Bird Catches the Wormhole: Observations from the StellarParticle Campaign. Retrieved February 7, 2022.
